name: Bombot Barrage
description:
Oh no, Dr. Bomboss is up to no good! Their factory is running at full force and is pumping out Bombots to fuel their nefarious goals! Now it’s up to our unlikely marble-shaped protagonist to infiltrate the factory, avoid the Bombots, and shut down the operation before it’s too late!

----------------

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look Around

Esc - Exit (Windows Only)

----------------

This game began as an individual level design assignment, which I then polished up over part of the winter break. It's short and sweet, and I hope you enjoy!
